text: This video can not be playedFamily, friends and fans have been grieving for K-pop star Jonghyun, a singer in of one of the biggest groups of its kind, SHINee.His death has sparked waves of grief among fans, with thousands visiting the hospital where his body was held.A note believed to have been sent by him to a friend spoke of his struggles with depression and fame.
title: Jonghyun - Family, friends and fans bid K-pop star farewell
